process_ncsmc_output.py¶

A module to consolidate all functions in ncsmc_python, so you can just feed it the NCSMC output, and it gives you a bunch of useful stuff:

  • plots of all resonances

  • spaghetti plot with interesting resonances

  • level scheme plot

ncsmc_python.process_ncsmc_output.add_nmax_data(Nmax_list)¶

Add data to be plotted on the level scheme for each Nmax in Nmax_list

ncsmc_python.process_ncsmc_output.add_resonances(Nmax, eigenphase_flipped, channels_str, channel_titles, bound_energies, bound_titles)¶

Use eigenphase file to find details about resonances (widths, energies)

ncsmc_python.process_ncsmc_output.get_experimental()¶

Grab experimental data from a file which must be prepared in advance.

ncsmc_python.process_ncsmc_output.plot_scheme()¶

Plot a level scheme!

ncsmc_python.process_ncsmc_output.select_interesting_channels(Nmax)¶

Get interesting channels (i.e. those channels which contain resonances) by using human input in a file.
